mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board_file (board_file_original_name, board_file_uuid, board_file_path, board_file_size, board_id) values(#{fileMainName}, #{boardFileUuid}, #{fileMainSize}, #{fileMainPath}, (SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() lastNum from tbl_member group by lastNum))

insert insert into tbl_board_file (board_file_original_name, board_file_uuid, board_file_path, board_file_size, board_id) values(#{files.fileDetailName}, #{files.fileDetailUuid}, #{files.fileDetailPath}, #{files.fileDetailSize}, (SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() lastNum from tbl_member group by lastNum))
mapper.select: select board_file_id, board_file_original_name, board_file_uuid, board_file_path, board_file_size, board_id from tbl_board_file where board_file_path = date_format(current_timestamp() - interval 1 day, '%Y/%m/%d')
